maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: We meet again, young one.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Nous nous rencontrons à nouveau, jeune fille.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Brought me something, right?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: M'as apporté quelque chose, pas vrai ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: How...?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Comment... ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Didn't leave the book on accident.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: N'ai pas laissé le livre derrière moi par accident.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Sensed something good in you. Also found my drill.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Senti quelque chose de bon en toi. Et trouvé ma foreuse.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Feeling you're ready for its true power.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Senti que tu étais prête pour son véritable pouvoir.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Need to find 5 Stones first. Called \c[3]Origin Stones\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Dois trouver 5 Pierres avant. S'appellent les \c[3]Pierre Originelles\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Rumor says each major settlement holds them.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: On dit que toutes les colonies en ont une.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Gotta work if ya want something good, aye?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Faut bosser pour avoir quelque chose de bien, hein ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Need to find 5 Stones first. Called \c[3]Origin Stones\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Dois trouver 5 Pierres avant. S'appellent les \c[3]Pierre Originelles\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Rumor says each major settlement holds them.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: On dit que toutes les colonies en ont une.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Gotta work if ya want something good, aye?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Faut bosser pour avoir quelque chose de bien, hein ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Brought the Stones?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: As apporté les Pierres ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Good. Now find an old friend of mine.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Bien. Maintenant, trouve un ancien ami à moi.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Only one I know who can combine the stones.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Le seul que je connaisse qui peut combiner les pierres.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Very old, not sure if he's still alive.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Très vieux, pas sûr qu'il soit encore en vie.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Gotta try at least, aye?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Vaut mieux le coup d'essayer, pas vrai ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Should be in a cave somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Devrait être dans une grotte quelque part sur le \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Pretty lonesome fella. Good Luck.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Un type assez solitaire. Bonne Chance.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Find an old friend of mine.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Trouve un ancien ami à moi.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Only one I know who can combine the stones.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Le seul que je connaisse qui peut combiner les pierres.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Very old, not sure if he's still alive.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Très vieux, pas sûr qu'il soit encore en vie.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Gotta try at least, aye?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Vaut mieux le coup d'essayer, pas vrai ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Should be in a cave somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Devrait être dans une grotte quelque part sur le \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Pretty lonesome fella. Good Luck.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Un type assez solitaire. Bonne Chance.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: You're back. Old geezer still got the spark in him.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Tu es revenue. Ce vieux bougre n'a pas perdu son entrain.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: You ready to do this?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Tu es prête à faire ça ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Alright, take a step back, then put the stone and drill in front of you, will ya?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Bon, fait un pas en arrière, puis met la pierre et la foreuse en face de toi, tu veux ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: This is goodbye, Seeker.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je te fais mes adieux, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Thanks for giving me the chance to be of use one last time.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Merci pour m'avoir donné la chance de me rendre utile une dernière fois.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: ...Why?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Don't worry, all will be well. Now, let's begin.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, tout ira bien. Commençons.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Use it wisely, Seeker.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Utilise-la avec soin, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Baxton
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Baxton

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Lady Lea!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mademoiselle Lea !
Salut... !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: It's my pleasure to meet you again.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: C'est un plaisir de vous revoir.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Albeit for rather unpleasant reasons...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Bien que cela soit pour des raisons assez déplaisantes...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Why?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: As you might remember from the last time our paths intertwined, I was following a suspicious player.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Comme vous vous en souvenez peut-être, la dernière fois que l'on s'est croisé, j'étais sur la piste d'un joueur suspect.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: He has been quiet for a few days, but just hours ago another report was made.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Il s'est tenu tranquille ces derniers temps, mais quelques heures plus tôt, un autre signalement a été effectué.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: A player with a lab coat and large glasses was seen in this room asking other players for help.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Un joueur avec une blouse de laboratoire et de grandes lunettes a été vu dans cette pièce en train de demander de l'aide à d'autres joueurs.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I must find this individual. Only once I see him can I check his account, I'm afraid.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je dois trouver cet individu. C'est seulement en le voyant que je pourrais vérifier son compte.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: It is quite possible this man is trying to find a way to breach our security systems.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Il est fortement possible que cet homme essaye de trouver un moyen de pénétrer dans notre système de sécurité.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: How?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Comment ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Maybe by finding a weakness in one of the sub-systems used in CrossWorlds.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Peut-être en trouvant une vulnérabilité dans un des sous-systèmes utilisés dans CrossWorlds.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Which must be the reason he is asking players to complete seemingly mundane tasks.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ce serait la raison pour laquelle il demande à des joueurs de remplir des tâches routinières.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: And there are also these odd probes. He managed to smuggle objects into the game that are obviously not allowed.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Et il y a aussi ces sondes étranges. Il a réussi à faire entrer ces objets qui ne sont manifestement pas autorisés.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Lady Lea, would you be willing to participate in my hunt for this perpetrator?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mademoiselle Lea, voudriez-vous participer à ma chasse au coupable ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Thank you, Lady Lea! This matter is of utmost importance.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Merci beaucoup, Mademoiselle Lea ! Cette affaire est de la plus haute importance.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Let us split the work load. I will analyze reports that just came.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Partageons-nous le travail. Je vais analyser les rapports qui viennent d'arriver.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Please, check every \c[3]Landmark in \v[area.forest.name]\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: S'il vous plait, vérifiez tous les \c[3]Points de repères sur la \v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Henry might have done something to them, judging from my previous reports.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Henry leur a probablement fait quelque chose, si on en juge par les rapports précédents.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Don't bother with the ones you've already unlocked.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ne vous occupez pas de ceux que vous avez déjà débloqués.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Once you are finished, please meet me here.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Une fois que vous aurez fini, s'il vous plait, retrouvez-moi ici.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: This is indeed troublesome.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Il y a effectivement de quoi s'inquiéter.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: How did a player manage to get a foreign object into the game?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Comment un joueur a bien pu réussir à introduire un objet étranger dans le jeu ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Something just feels... wrong here.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Il y a quelque chose de... louche là-dessous.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: For now, help this Baxton. I will try to help on my end.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Pour l'instant, aide ce Baxton. Je vais essayer d'aider de mon côté.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I understand. A player should enjoy the game and not embark in moderation tasks.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je comprends. Un joueur devrait jouer au jeu et ne pas s'embarquer dans de la modération.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Baxton
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Baxton

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Let us split the work load. I will analyze reports that just came.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Partageons-nous le travail. Je vais analyser les rapports qui viennent d'arriver.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Please, check every \c[3]Landmark in \v[area.forest.name]\c[0]. Previous reports suggest "Henry" was checking each one.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: S'il vous plait, vérifiez tous les \c[3]Points de repères sur la \v[area.forest.name]\c[0]. Les précédents rapports indiquent que "Henry" les a tous vérifiés.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Once you are finished, please meet me here.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Une fois que vous aurez fini, s'il vous plait, retrouvez-moi ici.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Baxton
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Baxton

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Lady Lea, I can see you've unlocked all of the landmarks!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mademoiselle Lea, je vois que vous avez débloqué tous les points de repères !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Splendid work!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Excellent travail !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Now, let's see... I can use a terminal to cross-reference your data, Lady Lea.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Maintenant, voyons voir... Je peux utiliser un terminal pour croiser vos données, Mademoiselle Lea.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Baxton
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Baxton

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Blimey, I can't see anything strange...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mince, je ne vois rien d'étrange...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Nothing wrong with the landmarks, that is quite a relief.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Tout est en ordre avec les points de repères, c'est un vrai soulagement.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Enemy data and collection properties are all in order.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Les données sur les ennemis et les propriétés de collections sont en ordre.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: The quests given by this Henry person were legitimate as far as I can see.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: De ce que je peux voir, les quêtes données par cet Henry étaient entièrement légitimes.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Wait... There is something here...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Attendez... Il y a quelque chose là...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Some kind of outgoing link?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Un lien vers l'extérieur ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Let's see what happens if we block the pathways...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Voyons voir ce qui se passe si je bloque le lien...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Baxton
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Baxton

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Henry
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Henry
... Salut ?!

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: W-w-well, well. I guess my cover is officially b-b-broken.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: B-Bien, bien, bien. Ainsi, ma couverture est f-f-fichue.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Lady Lea, is this the man I am looking for?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mademoiselle Lea, est-ce l'homme que nous cherchons ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Sir, it came to our attention that you might be involved in unauthorized activities.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Monsieur, il semblerait que vous soyez impliqué dans des activités non autorisées.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Additionally, hacking a moderation terminal is against CrossWorlds Policy.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: De plus, pirater un terminal de modération est interdit par la Politique d'Utilisation de CrossWorlds.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I regret to inform you that we will have to suspend your account for an indeterminate amount of time.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: J'ai le regret de vous informer que nous allons devoir suspendre votre compte pendant une durée indéterminée.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: T-T-Try and stop m-me, but y-y-you won't catch m-me!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: V-V-Vous pouvez toujours essayer de m-m-m'arrêter, mais vous m'attraperez j-jamais !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Baxton
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Baxton

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Well, that is quite unexpected. I will just have to disconnect him from this terminal then.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Eh bien, c'est assez inattendu. Je vais juste devoir le déconnecter de ce terminal, alors.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Let's see here...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Voyons voir...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: This is impossible!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: C'est impossible !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I can't find the user. It's as if he does not exist!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je ne peux pas trouver l'utilisateur. C'est comme s'il n'existait pas !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: This should be simply impossible, Lady Lea.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ce serait tout simplement impossible, Mademoiselle Lea.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Either this fiend breached our security system quite severely, or...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ou bien ce scélérat s'est introduit très sévèrement dans nos systèmes de sécurité, ou bien...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: ...or he's not an Avatar!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: ... ou bien ce n'est pas un Avatar !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: ...How?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: ... Comment ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Lady Lea, we MUST find him.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mademoiselle Lea, nous DEVONS le retrouver.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: According to the logs, he is still in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: D'après les logs, il est toujours sur la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: We have to collect clues as to where he is hiding.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Nous devons recueillir des indices pour savoir où il se cache.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Maybe some of the players in this area know something.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Peut-être que des joueurs ici savent quelque chose.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I will search the surrounding regions from here.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je vais chercher dans les régions aux alentours.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Please see if you can find out anything from the players here in the Cave Inn.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Essayez de voir si vous pouvez trouver quelque chose sur ce joueur dans cette Auberge.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Lea, this is a very serious situation.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Lea, cette situation est très sérieuse.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I cannot find this user either and impersonating an Avatar just sounds too far-fetched.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je n'arrive pas non plus à trouver cet utilisateur et imiter un Avatar c'est un peu tiré par les cheveux.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Help Baxton, I will see what I can do on my end.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Aide Baxton. Je vais voir ce que je peux faire de mon côté.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Baxton
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Baxton

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I will search the surrounding regions, from here.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je vais chercher dans les régions aux alentours.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Please see if you can find out anything from the players here in the Cave Inn.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Essayez de voir si vous pouvez trouver quelque chose sur ce joueur dans cette Auberge.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Listen to their conversations, maybe they saw something. Anything helps.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Écoutez leurs conversations, peut-être qu'ils ont vus quelque chose. Chaque indice compte.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Baxton
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Baxton

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Hello, Lady Lea. Have you found anything new?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Bonjour, Mademoiselle Lea. Avez-vous trouvé des nouveaux indices ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Wonderful! What can you tell me?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Merveilleux ! Que pouvez-vous me dire ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: How?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Comment ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Why, by using words, Lady Lea. Is something the matter?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Avec des mots, naturellement, Mademoiselle Lea. Est-ce que quelque chose ne va pas ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Lea...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Lea...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Ah! I see what is bothering you, dear Lea.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ah ! Je vois ce qui vous embête, cher Lea.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Your speech module must be malfunctioning, is that it?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Votre module vocal doit être défectueux, pas vrai ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I'm terribly sorry to hear that. What a cumbersome circumstance, indeed...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je suis vraiment désolé d'entendre cela. Ce doit être une situation agaçante pour vous...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.note: this de, en is ambiguous, maybe cumbersome for lea, but not for sharing clues ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: However, am I right to assume you are able to track our perpetrator?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mais, ai-je raison de considérer que vous avez retrouvé la trace de cet individu ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: This will do, then!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ça devrait suffire alors !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: You go on ahead and find him, I will follow you by using our tracking system.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Partez devant et trouvez-le, je vais vous suivre en utilisant notre système de traçage.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Lea, I have found out more about Henry.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Lea, j'ai trouvé quelque chose sur Henry.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: It seems he is part of an organization called \c[3]IHSO\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: On dirait qu'il fait partie d'une organisation appelée l'\c[3]OIHS\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Information about them is scarce but they seem to be involved in various hacking activities.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Il y a peu d'informations sur eux, mais ils semblent être impliqués dans diverses activités de hacking.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.note: hacking is well used here, because this quest is a joke

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: You had better hurry, this might get dangerous.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Tu ferais mieux de te dépêcher, ça pourrait devenir dangereux.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Baxton
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Baxton

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: You go on ahead and find him, I will follow you by using our tracking-system.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Partez devant et trouvez-le, je vais vous suivre en utilisant notre système de traçage.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Data Probe
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Sonde de Données

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Booting...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Démarrage...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Starting Scan Routine...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Démarrage Routine de Scan...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: ERROR: Missing Component 361F
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: ERREUR : Composant 361F introuvable

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: "Strange Device" Clue
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Indice "Appareil Étrange"

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Did Henry build these probes here?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Est-ce que Henry a construit ces appareils ici ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: It would explain why we cannot find the object in the database.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Cela expliquerait pourquoi on ne peut pas trouver l'objet dans la base de données.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Oh hello, can I help you?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Oh, bonjour, puis-je vous aider ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Salut !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Yes, hello again. Now, state your business, I'm very busy you know.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Oui, bonjour. Sinon, que voulez-vous ? Je suis très occupé, vous savez.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: ...Lea.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: ... Lea.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Wait, are you saying you found the blueprint I'm looking for?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Attendez, vous voulez dire que vous avez trouvé le plan que je cherche ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Incredible!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Incroyable !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Give it to me, quick now!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Donnez-le-moi, vite !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: \v[item.497.name]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: \v[item.497.name]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Ah... I see, I see...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ah... Je vois...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: So if I have these materials, I can just put them together...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Donc si j'ai ces matériaux, je peux juste les combiner...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: It says here all the parts are hidden by the creator of the blueprint.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Il est indiqué que tous les morceaux ont été cachés par le dessinateur du plan.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Quelque part dans le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Seeker!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Hi?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Salut ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: If you find these materials for me, I will build the best shoes you will ever wear.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Si vous trouvez ces matériaux pour moi, je vais fabriquer les meilleures chaussures que vous aurez jamais portées !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: So, what do you say?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Donc, qu'en dites-vous ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Let's set this up as a regular trade.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mettons en place un marchandage.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Talk to me to look at the required materials.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Parlez-moi pour regarder les matériaux nécessaires.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: It has been done.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: C'est maintenant terminé.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Finally I can find a new project.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Enfin je peux me mettre à un autre projet.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Thank you, Seeker.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Merci à vous, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Now, leave me. My creator-mind needs solitude!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Maintenant, partez. Mon esprit créatif a besoin de solitude !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Leave me, Seeker. My creator-mind needs solitude!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Partez, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Mon esprit créatif a besoin de solitude !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: My Research said the blueprint was somewhere here...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mes recherches indiquent que le plan devrait se trouver quelque part par ici...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: If I could find it, I could complete my dream of crafting the best Geta ever.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Si je peux le trouver, je pourrai enfin réaliser mon rêve de créer les meilleurs Geta de l'univers.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Grandpa's Armor is still shiny as ever.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: L'armure de papy est toujours aussi brillante.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Jennifer Ling
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Jennifer Ling

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Salut !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Oh, w-why hello!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Oh, euh, b-bonjour !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Oh, i-its alright! You just startled me a bit.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Oh, tout va bien ! Vous m'avez juste un peu surprise.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I only recently moved here with my lovely husband Paro.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je viens de déménager ici récemment avec mon charmant mari Paro

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I'm still getting used to his family's traditions...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je ne suis toujours pas habituée à toutes ces traditions familiales...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: One of which is praying for a good day at least once per day.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: L'une d'elle est de prier pour une bonne journée au moins une fois par jour.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: They said I don't have to do this, as they respect where I'm coming from...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ils disent que je n'ai pas besoin de faire ça, car ils respectent d'où je viens...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: B-But how can I do that when they are all such nice people?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: M-Mais comment puis-je ne pas faire ça, alors qu'ils sont si adorables ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: A-Anyway, I hope it is okay if I return to my prayer for now.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: E-En tout cas, je pense que ça ira si je retourne à ma prière.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Jenni?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Jenni ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: O-Oh hello, Fi!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: O-Oh, bonjour, Fi !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Are you still praying?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Tu pries encore ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Well, yes... \.\.\. I want to make sure that I get it right.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Euh, oui...\.\.\. Je veux être sûre que je le fasse bien.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Aww, Jenni, you sweet thing. Don't worry so much, you're doing great!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ohh, Jenni, mon cœur. Ne stresse pas pour ça, tu t'en sors bien !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: R-Really? Thank you, Fi!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: V-Vraiment ? Merci, Fi !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Alright, I'll leave you to it. But don't overdo it, okay?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Bien, je vais te laisser continuer. Mais n'en fais pas trop, OK ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Y-Yes!
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: O-Oui !

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Towels look fine...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Les serviettes ont l'air correctes...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Which reminds me... \.\.\. where is Jing?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Ce qui me rappelle...\.\.\. où est passé Jing ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Jing Ling
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Jing Ling

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Stupid...
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Débile...

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: Huh? \.\.\.Oh\.\.\., sorry, I guess.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Hein ?\.\.\. Oh\.\.\., désolé, j'imagine.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: I kinda don't wanna talk right now, if that's cool.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Je n'ai pas envie de causer, si c'est bon pour toi.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.orig: My parents are annoying as is. I can't deal with Seekers right now.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-01.json/enti.text: Mes parents sont suffisamment agaçants comme ça. Je n'ai pas besoin d'un \v[lore.title.seeker] supplémentaire.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.orig: I hope you enjoy your stay at our humble establishment.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.text: J'espère que vous pourrez passer un agréable séjour dans notre humble établissement.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.orig: We \c[3]Lings\c[0] take pride in our Inn.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.text: Nous, les \c[3]Lings\c[0] sommes très fiers de notre Auberge.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.orig: If you like, you can also meet my dear mother, who owns it.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.text: Si vous voulez, vous pouvez aussi rencontrer notre chère mère, qui en est propriétaire.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.orig: Did you find time to talk to my mother?
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.text: Avez-vous pu trouver du temps pour parler à ma mère ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.orig: She was not always like this.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.text: Elle n'a pas toujours été comme ça.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.orig: When my younger brother disappeared into the depths of the bamboo thickets, she became that way...\.\.\. over time.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.text: Quand mon frère a disparu dans les profondeurs du maquis de bambous, elle est devenue comme ça...\.\.\. avec le temps.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.orig: She never gave up the search and after a while... she started talking in riddles.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.text: Elle n'a jamais abandonné ses recherches pour le retrouver... Elle a commencé à parler en énigmes.

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.orig: At one point she even claimed my brother returned as "the protector of the ridge".
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.text: À un moment elle racontait même que mon frère était revenu comme "le protecteur de la crête".

maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.orig: I think this loss was just too hard on her.
maps/forest/interior/inn-og-02.json/enti.text: Je crois que cette disparition était trop dure pour elle.
